title: Seattle Indies
description:
A simple event-focused WordPress theme for Seattle's indie video game development community, which I volunteer for and help organize. I was responsible for the design and development of this theme, including migrating the old site over from Squarespace, and maintain it to this day.

Particularly noteworthy about the site is its extensive use of social APIs. Apart from the blog, the site mostly acts a hub for the various social platforms the organization leverages - such as Facebook, Google Calendar, and Meetup.
